ResearchProjectDef.label: Knowledge
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will learn about Sweety and be able to create basic item.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cocoa Planter
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain knowledge of small cacao that can be created hydroponically.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Chocolate Polymorph
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to create weapons that mutate your enemies into chocolate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Taste and Beauty
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will be possible to create chocolate parfaits that can be used as gifts to the factions. It is very time consuming, but one can greatly improve friendship with a faction.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cold Fun
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to make delicious chocolate ice cream parfaits. It takes more time to make, but it is more filling and more resistant to the heat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooler Suit
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will be able to create a cooler suit, protecting Sweety from the heat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heat Resist Mod
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will be possible to perform modification surgery to make the Sweety more heat resistant.
